      • getGamesByPlayers

        public java.util.ArrayList<Game> getGamesByPlayers(int numOfPlayers)
        This function will get all games from the GameCollection table that meet the player requirement
        Parameters:
        numOfPlayers - The number players participating.
        Returns:
        A sorted ArrayList of Games from the Database
        Since:
        1.0

      • getGamesByFilter

        public java.util.ArrayList<Game> getGamesByFilter(java.lang.Integer numOfPlayers,
                                                  java.lang.Boolean bggNumPlayers,
                                                  java.lang.String playingTime,
                                                  java.lang.Integer minPlayerAge,
                                                  java.lang.Boolean bggPlayerAge,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> mechanics,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> categories)
        This function will get all games from the GameCollection table that meet the passed filters. Parameters can be passed as null if no filtering is desired on that parameter.
        Parameters:
        numOfPlayers - The number players participating as an Integer.
        bggNumPlayers - Boolean used to determine if search will use manufacturer (false) or BGG (true) player count recommendation. Must pass true or false if numPlayers is not null.
        playingTime - String representing playing time. Only accepts "0-60", "60-120", or "120+". Otherwise will return null.
        minPlayerAge - Integer representing the minimum player age.
        bggPlayerAge - Boolean used to determine if search will use manufacturer (false) or BGG (true) player age recommendation. Must pass true or false if numPlayers is not null.
        mechanics - ArrayList of Strings containing all mechanics to be filtered against. Game must contain all mechanics to be returned.
        categories - ArrayList of Strings containing all categories to be filtered against. Game must contain all categories to be returned.
        Returns:
        A sorted ArrayList of Games from the Database or null if no or incoreect parameters passed.
        Since:
        2.0

      • getGameByID

        public Game getGameByID(int passed_id)
        This function will get a game from the GameCollection table that has the passed id
        Parameters:
        passed_id - the id of the desired game
        Returns:
        A Game object of the requested game
        Since:
        1.0
